item.title: Clan system question
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok im makin my own clan system for the three gods. and i was wondering if i put this code in, if it would totally screw up my server. (also dont try making a server on a mac, and playing it on a pc. the computer will beep at you…Seriously)

if (playerIsInZamorakClan = true){ playerPickedClan = "Zamorak"; } else if (playerIsInSaradominClan = true){ playerPickedClan = "Saradomin"; } else if (playerIsinGuthixClan = true){ playerPickedClan = "Guthix"; }

Read full topic
